Description:
We arrive at a camp where several healers treat the wounded from the war.

One of them, a young pigman, approaches us and says:

(Ottis) "Oink... my name is Ottis and I have come to help heal the war wounded. I have already finished healing most of them... Oink... and I think I could be more useful at the front, healing on the spot.
DescriptionAction: Oink... what do you say, may I join you?"
